solution.step3: Enter the code at the bottom of the tablet otherwise it is made up of 6 digits: id su sport center + 01 or 02

camera_down.title: Verifier si la camera est down
camera_down.text: Vous souhaitez verifier si une des cameras est down?

solution.step_2: Recover the IP address of the camera in the database (in the field camera field)
solution.step_3: Paste it in the browser if an interface is displayed it is not down
solution.step_4: To connect and have access to the stream, the identifiers are: admin and ngtv @ NGTV

progress: But, you know, I don’t think there’s a good situation or a bad situation. If I were to summarize my life with you today, I would say that it was first of all meetings, people who reached out to me, perhaps at a time when I could not, when I was alone at home. And it is rather curious to think that chance and encounters forge a destiny… Because when you have a taste for something, when you have a taste for something well done, the beautiful gesture, sometimes you do not find the interlocutor opposite, I would say, the mirror that helps you move forward. So this is not my case, as I said, since I, on the contrary, was able to; and I say thank you to life, I say thank you to it, I sing life, I dance life… I am only love! And finally, when many people today tell me, But how do you get this humanity? , well I answer them very simply, I tell them that it is this taste of love, this taste therefore that has pushed me today to undertake a mechanical construction, but tomorrow, who knows, perhaps only to put myself at the service of the community, to make the gift, the gift of self…
